mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CENQUERY (CENQUERYSEQ, OPEN, QUERYTYPE, CUSSEQ, SELLERSEQ, CONTENT, TITLE) VALUES (CENQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{open}, #{queryType}, #{cusSeq}, #{sellerSeq}, #{content}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CENQUERYSEQ DESC) AS RNUM, CENQUERY.CENQUERYSEQ, CENQUERY.OPEN, CENQUERY.QUERYTYPE, CENQUERY.CUSSEQ, CENQUERY.SELLERSEQ, CENQUERY.CONTENT, CENQUERY.TITLE, CENQUERY.REGDATE, CENQUERY.REPLY, CUSTOMER.CUSID, SELLER.BUSINESSNAME, SELLER.ID FROM CENQUERY LEFT JOIN CUSTOMER ON CENQUERY.CUSSEQ = CUSTOMER.CUSSEQ LEFT JOIN SELLER ON CENQUERY.SELLERSEQ = SELLER.SELLERSEQ ) )
